channel.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest the same? I don't get it
channel.description: I am just curious as why they have similar names, because they are not the same thing ?? What is the relationship??? I just want somebody to clear up this for me please. thank you.

item.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest the same? I don't get it
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:7, topic:323701”]MITB - Smart people
MSCP - People pretending to be smart[/quote]
uncalled for, I yet have to find out why MITB come here if they don’t like it. It’s like eating something you don’t like just because it is there.

Read full topic

item.source: Moparscape and Moparisthebest the same? I don't get it

item.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest the same? I don't get it
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Back when this site just started, we just had private server sections on moparisthebest.com/smf

  • moparisthebest.com/smf didn’t exist.

Out of nowhere, the popularity of private servers grew extremely fast and our forums were flooded with moronic people with moronic questions. To solve this problem, mopar created moparisthebest.com/smf so that everyone who wanted to know about private servers could go there, and not disrupt the members at mitb forums.

You can use your same account to login to both sides of the forums. So basically the point of each site:
Moparscape: All private server stuff goes here
Moparisthebest: general discussion of anything/programming/rs cheating

Read full topic
